turns.content: I'm planning professional development activities for 2024. For each month of 2024, please list the 2nd Thursday, 4th Monday, and 4th Thursday

Sure, here are the dates you've requested for each month of 2024:

* January 2nd Thursday: January 11th
* January 4th Monday: January 22nd
* January 4th Thursday: January 25th
* February 2nd Thursday: February 8th
* February 4th Monday: February 26th
* February 4th Thursday: February 22nd
* March 2nd Thursday: March 14th
* March 4th Monday: March 25th
* March 4th Thursday: March 28th
* April 2nd Thursday: April 11th
* April 4th Monday: April 22nd
* April 4th Thursday: April 25th
* May 2nd Thursday: May 9th
* May 4th Monday: May 27th
* May 4th Thursday: May 23rd
* June 2nd Thursday: June 13th

* July 2nd Thursday: July 11th
* July 4th Monday: July 22nd
* July 4th Thursday: July 25th
* August 2nd Thursday: August 8th
* August 4th Monday: August 26th
* August 4th Thursday: August 22nd
* September 2nd Thursday: September 12th
* September 4th Monday: September 23rd
* September 4th Thursday: September 26th
* October 2nd Thursday: October 10th
* October 4th Monday: October 28th
* October 4th Thursday: October 24th
* November 2nd Thursday: November 14th
* November 4th Monday: November 25th
* November 4th Thursday: November 28th
* December 2nd Thursday: December 12th
* December 4th Monday: December 23rd
* December 4th Thursday: December 26th

Note that these dates are based on the assumption that every month has exactly 31 days. If a month has fewer days (e.g. February), then the dates may be different.
Can you list these dates under a header for each month please?

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
Great. Please list each month's date above by whether it is the second thursday, the fourth monday, or the fourth thursday.
